Armor of Souls

armor (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 212
armor id [armor]: 56 (Armor of Souls)
protection, body [protbody]: 16
defence [def]: -1
encumbrance [enc]: 1
magic bonus [boosters]: +B
magic resistance [mr]: +5

Requires 40B to forge (B5)

This suit of chainmail was forged from forty pure souls. The souls inside the armor will help protect the wearer from both physical and magical attacks. A mage skilled in Blood magic will also experience increased magical powers while wearing this armor.
